docs.lead_paragraph: EVER since a sizable segment of humanity emerged from its exclusive preoccupation with getting enough to eat, it has been deeply concerned with deciding what to eat Issues of politics come and go, but the debate about diet is perennial. And for a very good reason.

headline.main: FOODS FOR A LONGER LIFE AND A LIVELIER ONE; Science Seeks to Measure More Precisely the Kind of Diet That Will Give Us Protection
